scenario.name: uac
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field2]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, INFO Supported: 100rel, replaces Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Disposition: session Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 4771089757812431982 6672088802327658246 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Session SDP c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 18 96 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=rtpmap:96 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:96 16 a=silenceSupp:on - - - -

ACK sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field2]@[field1]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field2]@[field1]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
